full_description:
Apple A1748 EarPods with Lightning Connector Original (MMTN2FE/A)

The Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector delivers an unparalleled wireless headphone experience simply take them out and they are ready to use with all your devices put them in your ears and they connect immediately, immersing you in rich, high-quality sound. Ear Pods deliver a faster and more stable wireless connection to your devices and up to twice as fast when switching between active devices. Besides, the Ear Pods with Lightning Connector also include a built-in remote that lets you adjust the volume, control the playback of music and video, and answer or end calls with a pinch of the cord. So whether you are playing games, listening to music, or enjoying podcasts, you'll experience higher-quality sound. Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector come with 6-month warranty (One Time Replacement).

full_description:
Apple A3046 Earpods with USB C Connector (MTJY3FE/A)

The Apple A3046 EarPods with Type C Connector are a ground-breaking audio technological innovation designed to provide an unrivaled listening experience. Unlike standard round earbuds, the EarPods have a unique shape that is precisely developed to adhere to the natural geometry of the ear, offering a pleasant and secure fit for a wide spectrum of users. This ergonomic design not only increases comfort, but it also improves sound quality by reducing sound leakage and increasing acoustic efficiency. Advanced speaker technology was used within the EarPods to improve sound output, resulting in rich, immersive audio with crystal-clear clarity across a wide range of music and media genres. The A3046 EarPods provide a quality audio experience when listening to music, viewing movies, or making video chats. What distinguishes the EarPods (USB-C) is their integrated remote control feature. A built-in remote allows users to easily adjust volume settings, control music and video playing, and handle incoming calls with the push of a button. This helpful feature improves usability and provides smooth control over your audio experience. These EarPods are compatible with certain Mac models running macOS Monterey 12.6 or later, iPad models running iPadOS 16.4 or later, and iPhone models running iOS 17 or later. They provide universal compatibility and seamless connection with your Apple A3046 earpods. Whether you're working, resting, or on the go, the Apple A3046 EarPods with Type C Connector deliver an immersive, high-fidelity audio experience that pushes the boundaries of earbud-style headphones.
